transformingFrom: Transforming spaces into exceptional living experiences since 2019
coverTitle: Investment, residential and commercial real estate
coverDesc: AISI Group offers a diverse range of projects designed to meet various needs, including residential homes, investment apartments, and commercial properties.
whyInvestSubtitle: Discover the compelling reasons that make Batumi an exceptional investment opportunity
growingTourismDesc: Rapidly expanding tourism market with year-round visitors and increasing international attention.
propertyAppreciationDesc: Strong annual property value growth with projected increases of 8-12% over the next five years.
governmentIncentivesDesc: Tax advantages and development grants available for foreign investors in tourism infrastructure.
strategicLocationDesc: Positioned at a crossroads between major markets with excellent transportation connections.
faqQuestion1: What amenities are included with each floor?
faqAnswer1: Each floor comes with access to all building amenities including 24/7 security, dedicated parking spaces, the rooftop garden, fitness center, swiming pool and community gathering spaces. Higher floors may have enhanced views and premium finishes.
faqQuestion2: How do I schedule a viewing?
faqAnswer2: You can schedule a viewing by contacting our sales office at (123) 456-7890 or by filling out the contact form on our website. Our team will arrange a convenient time for you to visit the property and explore your preferred floor options.
faqAnswer3: The purchasing process begins with selecting your preferred floor and unit. Once you've made your selection, our sales team will guide you through the reservation process, financing options, contract signing, and closing procedures. We're here to make your home-buying experience as seamless as possible.
